description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nFlesh Rot:
After an enemy is afflicted with either {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_WEAK} or {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_VULNERABLE}, this creature afflicts them with whichever of these debuffs the target doesn't already have.
name: Brute Stitches
